Rotation.RotationList: [Misc] Init|[Misc] Pause|[Misc] Bossmod|Selfheal|Pillar of Frost|Raise Dead|Blood Tap (>10 and RP > 76 or KM)|Frost Strike (KM or RP > 88)|Plague Leech|Outbreak|Soul Reaper|Blood Tap (Soul Reaper)|Howling Blast (no debuff)|Plague Strike (no debuff)|Howling Blast (Rime)|Frost Strike (RP > 76)|Obliterate (Unholy > 1)|Howling Blast (Death > 1 or Frost > 1)|Horn of Winter|Obliterate (Unholy > 0)|Howling Blast|Blood Tap (>= 8 or Calc > 35)|Death and Decay|Frost Strike (RP >= 40)|Empower Rune Weapon
Rotation.RotationNotes:
left Shift - Pause Rotation left Ctrl - Switch Howling blast on/off left Alt - Switch DnD on/off
right Ctrl - Switch cooldown mode auto/boss only
